title: Path To Citizenship - Kinda Funny Doodles

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: See, here's the thing about the wall. It's not necessarily that I want to keep people out with it. You want to keep me, it's that I want you to earn it. I want you to scale this wall. There's a man in a desk on top of the wall. He's got one stamp and he's got like a thing going on and he he gives you and he's like, "What's your name?" And he, you know, Americanizes it for you. Yeah. And he probably misspells it and then that's who you are. You know, I just want I want, you know, the literal path to citizenship. That would be awesome. There is a thing we call the pathway to citizenship. There's all sorts of It's like Ninja Warrior. That's See, that's my thing. I don't want to I don't I don't like bringing in this super race of Mexicans. We're only bringing in the best and most athletic. They're just soon they will rise above us. So, what about this? You have a few pathways to citizenship. Okay. I was going to say, can we have the wipe out one where they're getting punched in the

They're just soon they will rise above us. So, what about this? You have a few pathways to citizenship. Okay. I was going to say, can we have the wipe out one where they're getting punched in the dick and stuff? You read my mind. Jump on the bouncy balls and hole in the wall. That's going to be another one because and then not only does this give us reality television, but then people can come in legally. Yeah. But it's time to face the hole. That's the first thing you have to do. It's time to face the hole.

I corrected "legally" from the original text as it was a clear error given the context of the conversation about pathways to citizenship.
